::Prowl::

Prowl nods, kneeling down to examine this bot's friends. "Yeah, I'm a 
Maximal. My name's Prowl."

He taps a few buttons on his comm-link, sending a transmission to the 
Cybertronian Fire. "I'll get a shuttle over here in a few mins, then 
we can help your friends."

Prowl looks around at the crash site, shaking his head and looking 
back at Firedrill. "What happened here?" he asks, "And what's your 
name?"





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Firedrill looked up at the new robot, and he crawled over to where
> Beachcomber was lying motionless, climbing over him, in a 
protective way.
> "Please, dont hurt them, take me instead" he said trying to hold 
his body
> weight up with one arm. He then looked closer at the robot, his 
visro
> making a whirling noise, it was his aimer zooming in to take a good 
look at
> him, he noticed the Maximal symbol was on this one. "Your, your a 
Maximal?"
> he said between hoarsed breaths, "Please, help my friends" he 
blurts out
> desperately.
